game.name: Mysarium
game.categories: Single-player, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A cozy sandbox designed to accompany you as you go about your day. Take a break: relax, breathe, and create tiny worlds in glass. Grow plants, unlock new elements, and find secret combinations to summon special guests to photograph.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy sandbox designed to accompany you as you go about your day. Take a break: relax, breathe, and create tiny worlds in glass. Grow plants, unlock new elements, and find secret combinations to summon special guests to photograph.
